title: Betere tijden
description: Raf, Ubi and Robin help Merel study for her history test on the Hundred Years War, each digressing into anachronistic scenes and speculations, hence comparing ages. A group of terrorists can't agree how to achieve better times by bombing or peaceful means. A crime syndicate takes to the Streets and the press.

title: Avontuur
description: The team is bored, receiving almost no calls, strangely all concerning wars. So their minds drift to adventure, but their attitudes differ as much as their dreams, which are either epic or romantic, both also set in past eras.

title: Geld
description: The youth helpline is probably overspending its budget, especially on telephone and ITC, but rather then economizing, the rascals start fantasizing about riches. A caller asking about allowances for minors further stirs their minds wandering about the joys and perils of wealth and ways to earn and spend money, including robbery.

roles.char: Girl from 'Grieten Versieren met Raf Willems'
